img_above_text:
Gold Armored Rhino
After defeating the Golden-Armored Rhino you'll gain the Gold Suozi Armor, which is the second part of Wukong's Set.
img_below_text:
Fly up again when the battle is done and head for the edge of the cliff (the opposite side to the Keeper's Shrine and where you entered the fight).
![Foothills Walkthrough \(137\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9e/Foothills_Walkthrough_%28137%29.png)

img_summary: The image depicts a scenic cliffside area in a dark, mountainous environment with a stormy sky and lightning in the distance. A red arrow highlights a specific path or location near the edge of the cliff, likely guiding the player to proceed in that direction after the battle with the Golden-Armored Rhino. This serves as a visual cue in the walkthrough to help players navigate to the next objective.
